title: :D Finally got my penta
body:
:D I'm super happy after getting my penta with viktor idk why but I feel like I can take on the world right now.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1499365841/41778965

replies.body: My first was a volibear. Congrats tho!
congrats! good for you! but  is it really interesting that you got penta kill (no offense)?

I don't like that Riot is gonna rework Viktor, unless they are making him more powerful!!! 
I already think he's strong right now. However, I can see Riot's intentions of making people upgrading other abilities with his hex core and not just his OP laser.
I've gotten about 4 or 5 pentas with Viktor, glad to see others showing the power of the GLORIOUS EVOLUTION :D

I did it with pre-nerf {{champion:10}} :)
Congrats!

I feel like Viktor would be a difficult champion to get a penta on, great job!

My first was with MF, somehow after completely missing her ult. It was a D: moment that turned to a :D moment.
You even got first blood! Nice job, congrats! :D
